title: Testing Even Functions
text: Let's start by checking if the function is even. Even functions are defined as functions where $$f(x)=f(-x)$$.

title: Testing Even Functions
text: Evaluate $$f(-x)$$. $$f(-x)=-\left(x^3\right)-2x$$. Since this is not equivalent to $$x^3+2x$$, the function is not even.

title: Testing Odd Functions
text: Now, let's check if the function is odd. Odd functions are defined as functions where $$-f(x)=f(-x)$$.
speech: Now, let's check if the function is odd. Odd functions are defined as functions where  minus f of x is equal to, f of negative x .
pacedSpeech: Now, let's check if the function is odd. Odd functions are defined as functions where   minus f of x is equal to, f of negative x

title: Testing Odd Functions
text: We already found $$f(-x)$$ when we tested if the function was even, so we just have to evaluate $$-f(x)$$. $$-f(x)=-\left(x^3+2x\right)=-x$$. Since this is equivalent to $$-\left(x^3\right)-2x$$, the function is odd.
